title: Very nice calligraphy book
content: I just picked up _[The Art of Calligraphy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Art%20of%20Calligraphy)_ by [David Harris](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Harris). It's got an amazing amount of info on different historical [scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/script) with how-to instructions on how to pen them. Anyone else have this one?
author: matt_desmond
